ai-iti85:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti85:2.1_0: “Mendicants, meditate observing an aspect of the body.
ai-iti85:2.2_0: To mindfulness of breathing bring your own mouth.
ai-iti85:2.3_0: Meditate observing the impermanence of all conditions.
ai-iti85:2.4_0: When you meditate observing an aspect of the body,
ai-iti85:2.5_0: When mindfulness of breathing is well-established right there inside you, there will be no distressing external thoughts or wishes.
ai-iti85:2.6_0: When you meditate observing the impermanence of all conditions, ignorance is given up and knowledge arises.”
ai-iti85:2.7_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti85:4.2_0: and when freed in regards to that,
ai-iti85:4.3_0: that peaceful sage, with perfect insight,
ai-iti85:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti85:5.2_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
